sentence.Network_en: A novel broad - band omnidirectional monopole antenna with dual - frequency is presented.

sentence.Network_en: Is perhaps a single omnidirectional source the Holy Grail of audio?

sentence.Network_en: The pattern of omnidirectional, multilevel and wide - ranging opening - up has been improved continuously.
sentence.Network_cn: 全方位 、 多层次、宽领域的 对外开放 格局不断完善.
